title: How to Make Blood Capsules

steps.headline: Mix together the following ingredients: 10 milliliters (0.34  fl oz) of golden syrup (any kind that is not dark syrup),  5ml or teaspoon of water, 2 drops of red food colouring, 2 drops of blue food colouring and 1 drop of yellow food colouring.
steps.description: Mix everything together in a jug. If you wish, you may add a pinch of cocoa powder for a deeper red colour.

steps.headline: Pour the fake blood into the capsules.
steps.description: The kind of capsule you're looking for is an empty gel capsule, which can be found at most vitamin stores.

steps.headline: Remove the top from the capsule and carefully pour the fake blood mixture into it until it is full or half full.
steps.description: When you have filled each capsule sufficiently, place the top back on and close it tightly.

steps.headline: Repeat this until you have made enough fake blood caps.
When finished, place one in your mouth as needed.
steps.description: Let it warm up before breaking it in your mouth.
